Metadata.name: Signature Skills+ - Myriad Truths (Izanagi-no-Okami)
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
Allows Izanagi-no-Okami to learn the signature skill "Myriad Truths" at level 91 (innate) in place of "Megidolaon".
Deals heavy Almighty damage to all foes x3.
Power: 180 Accuracy: 95 Cost: 52 SP
